mapper.insert: insert into bbsctt_writing(bhf_code, user_id, bbsctgry_code, bbsctt_code, bbsctt_rgsde) values(#{bhf_code}, #{user_id}, 1, last_insert_id(), now());
mapper.select: select bc.bbsctt_code as bbsctt_code, bc.bbsctt_sj as bbsctt_sj, bc.bbsctt_cn as bbsctt_cn, e.event_begin_de as event_begin_de, e.event_end_de as event_end_de from bbsctt bc, event e, bbsctt_writing bw where bc.bbsctt_code = e.bbsctt_code and bw.bbsctt_code = e.bbsctt_code and (bw.bhf_code = #{bhf_code} or bw.bhf_code = 1)

select bc.bbsctt_code as bbsctt_code, bc.bbsctt_sj as bbsctt_sj, bw.bhf_code as bhf_code, bc.bbsctt_cn as bbsctt_cn, e.event_begin_de as event_begin_de, e.event_end_de as event_end_de from bbsctt bc, event e, bbsctt_writing bw where bc.bbsctt_code = e.bbsctt_code and bw.BBSCTT_CODE = e.BBSCTT_CODE and bc.bbsctt_code = #{code}

select bc.bbsctt_code as bbsctt_code, bc.bbsctt_sj as bbsctt_sj, bc.bbsctt_cn as bbsctt_cn, e.event_begin_de as event_begin_de, e.event_end_de as event_end_de from bbsctt bc, event e where bc.bbsctt_code = e.bbsctt_code and date_format(e.event_begin_de, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{date1} and #{date2}

select bc.bbsctt_code as bbsctt_code, bc.bbsctt_sj as bbsctt_sj from bbsctt bc, event e, bbsctt_writing bw where bc.bbsctt_code = e.bbsctt_code and bw.bbsctt_code = e.bbsctt_code and date_format(e.event_begin_de, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(e.event_begin_de, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(date_add(now(), interval +7 day), '%Y-%m-%d') and (bw.bhf_code = #{bhf_code} or bw.BHF_CODE = 1);

select n.ntcn_code as ntcn_code, n.sender as sender, n.reciever as reciever, n.bbsctt_code as bbsctt_code, b.bbsctt_sj as bbsctt_sj, to_days(date_format(e.event_begin_de, '%Y-%m-%d')) - to_days(date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) as dateCha from notification n, bbsctt b, event e where n.bbsctt_code = b.BBSCTT_CODE and e.BBSCTT_CODE = n.bbsctt_code and b.BBSCTT_CODE = e.BBSCTT_CODE and (n.reciever = #{reciever}) order by 6 desc
